short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display the remaining stock left on adidas.com items.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Don't want to miss out on the latest Adidas wear?
See how much stock is currently still left on adidas.com for all their products.
The number of items remaining appears next to the items size.


Encounter any issues or have a feature request, report them here: https://github.com/alexander-e-andrews/AdidasRemainingStock/issues/new

NOTE: Adidas Product Availability is developed independently, and is not affiliated with Adidas. No guarantee that stock numbers represent the true number of items Adidas still has.
